lead_paragraph: Risa Sugarman accuses Mayor Bill de Blasio’s team of flagrant violations with regard to gifts to county Democratic committees but ignores gifts to the state committee.

headline.print_headline: A State Report Full of Details and Holes
headline.main: Report on de Blasio Election Spending Is Full of Details and Holes

snippet: Risa Sugarman accuses Mayor Bill de Blasio’s team of flagrant violations with regard to gifts to county Democratic committees but ignores gifts to the state committee.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column examines report by State Board of Elections officer Risa S Sugarman accusing New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio and his allies of violations in donations to county Democratic committees during 2014 State Senate elections; notes that document is inconsistent because it criticizes some contributions to campaigns, while ignoring others.
